sentences.en: Britain and France have expressed some disagreement with the proposal.
sentences.cn: 英国和法国对这项提案已经发表了一些反对意见。

sentences.en: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.cn: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.en: Britain has fallen behind Japan in shipbuilding.
sentences.cn: 在造船方面英国已落到日本后头了。

sentences.en: Britain needs to bridge the technology gap between academia and industry.
sentences.cn: 英国需要弥合学术界和企业界之间的技术差距。

sentences.en: De Gaulle vetoed Britain's application to join the EEC.
sentences.cn: 戴高乐驳回了英国加入欧洲经济共同体的申请。

sentences.en: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.en: He really was one of the finest boxers in post-war Britain.
sentences.cn: 他确实是战后英国最优秀的拳击手之一。

sentences.en: In 1971, the 1p and 2p decimal coins were introduced in Britain.
sentences.cn: 英国于1971年开始使用十进制的1便士和2便士硬币。

sentences.en: In World War Ⅱ,Britain fought against Germany.
sentences.cn: 第二次世界大战中，英国对德国作战。

sentences.en: It is a part of Britain as yet largely unaccustomed to tourists.
sentences.cn: 英国的这一块地方还很不为游客所熟悉。

sentences.en: It is estimated that every year 50 unaccompanied children arrive in Britain.
sentences.cn: 据估计，每年有50名儿童独自来到英国。

sentences.en: Jane's goals helped Britain win third place in the Barcelona games.
sentences.cn: 简的进球帮助英国队在巴塞罗那奥运会上获得了第三名。

sentences.en: Many of Britain's beaches fail to meet minimum standards of cleanliness.
sentences.cn: 英国许多海滩连最起码的卫生标准都达不倒。

sentences.en: New Year's Day is a public holiday throughout Britain.
sentences.cn: 元旦是全英国的公众假日。

sentences.en: The vegetarian burger was an innovation which was rapidly exported to Britain.
sentences.cn: 素食汉堡是一种迅速传到了英国的新开发食品。

sentences.en: This is the stud  naturalized from Britain.
sentences.cn: 这是从不列颠引进的种马。

sentences.en: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
sentences.cn: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

sentences.en: We manage to get most of our produce in Britain.
sentences.cn: 我们设法在英国搞到我们所需的大部分农产品。

sentences.en: What went on was a scandal. It was a disgrace to Britain.
sentences.cn: 发生的一切是个丑闻，是给英国抹黑。

phrases.tran_cn: 不列颠之战（1940年7至10月英德空军的一系列战斗）；伦敦上空的鹰（电影名称）

trans.tran_en: the island containing England, Scotland and Wales, Great Britain
